events.name: The Toll-Eater's Pass
events.description: The road to Cran narrows as it enters the Toll-Eater's Pass, a treacherous stretch of broken hills and rocky outcrops. The terrain is a bandit's dream, offering countless hiding places and a clear view of the muddy road below. The ground is littered with the detritus of past ambushes â€“ splintered arrow shafts, a discarded shield, and the skeletal remains of a burnt-out merchant wagon half-swallowed by a ditch.

possibilities.description: This road is too dangerous. Find another way.
